name: Assia:Returning to Dreams
description:
Game Introduction:

The game is a platform jumping game where players will use simple spaces to jump between objects, avoid traps, and reach the final destination upwards. Experience the ultimate joy of cracking difficulties in this magical and confusing world!

The game has more than ten levels, and various daily and fantasy items will become larger and become platforms to support jumping. Traveling through various magical levels, solving puzzles on the road, and finding the only way to reach the top of your dreams!

There are no complex game mechanics, no bloody and terrifying battles, all you need to do is operate Assia to perform ordinary jumps, easy but not simple, and experience the joy of the initial game!

Art Introduction:

The main character, Asia, is a little girl with double-ponytail, whose color matching mainly adopts lovely and fresh colors. Combining the elements of a small skull, it adds a different color to the cute style.




Story:
Girl Assia woke up from her dream,

There is only an isolated temple in front of me.



The enlarged object extends into the sky,

Strange, too strange!



Wait, why does this statue look like her??

Also, why does eggplant also cause food poisoning???



Be sure to leave this strange place! Be sure to return to the village!



Developer Readme:

This game is a test game developed by our Green Snow Game Studio for testing various systems, engines, development and release processes. Therefore, our production team does not recommend players to purchase it. If you really want to play this game, you can send an email or contact the studio's official account (which will be announced gradually), We will try our best to send you a free CDKEY (as the studio has limited manpower and our main focus is on developing new projects). We are already developing a new and formal project and will meet with you as soon as possible. Stay tuned!
